articles.content:
It's a night to celebrate the best films, actors and filmmakers of the past year, and 2023's BAFTA Film Awards gave us a revamped ceremony, not one but two-hosts, and a brand-new venue.

articles.author: Tim Jonze, Mee-Lai Stone
articles.title: ‘I hope it gives young people some ideas!’: David Hockney’s immersive art show – photo essay - The Guardian
articles.description: A new exhibition lets us see the Yorkshire artist’s greatest hits – and overlooked rarities – through new eyes. Photographer Justin Sutcliffe went behind the scenes
articles.content: Ive always been interested in technology and pictures, says David Hockney, still sharp at 85 in both mind and style, and preparing to unleash one of his most ambitious projects to date. With Bigger &… [+7220 chars]

articles.title: Horoscopes today - Russell Grant's star sign forecast for Monday, February 20 - Express
articles.description: TODAY'S horoscope has one star sign adding a touch of the unusual to their routine, while another strives to achieve a sense of harmony. What else can you expect? Russell Grant shares his analysis

articles.title: TV tonight: what really happens at a convicted murderer’s parole meeting? - The Guardian
articles.description: A new documentary shows all sides of the story in the parole process. Plus: Joel and Ellie find a momentary respite in The Last of Us. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
Parole
9pm, BBC Two
